meta.title: Executive Summary
meta.subtitle: Strategic overview of MyRoomie's European expansion opportunity for time-constrained executives

executiveOverview.title: The Opportunity
executiveOverview.mainStatement: MyRoomie is positioned to become Europe's leading Living-as-a-Service platform, addressing the 500B€+ European housing market through an integrated AI-powered ecosystem combining consumer matching, quality property operations, and enterprise services.
executiveOverview.supportingText: With 9.6M housing units shortage across Europe and 300K+ annual BPO relocations, MyRoomie's three-pillar platform creates network effects and sustainable competitive advantages. The company targets 110M€ revenue by 2031 across 11 European markets (151% CAGR), achieving profitability by Q4 2028 with strong unit economics and proven market penetration strategies.

pillars.title: MyRoomie Connect
pillars.subtitle: AI-Powered B2C Platform
pillars.description: Advanced flatmate matching with premium subscriptions and value-added services

pillars.title: MyRoomie Spaces
pillars.subtitle: Quality Property Operations
pillars.description: MyRoomie Homes branded properties with hybrid ownership/management model

pillars.title: MyRoomie Enterprise
pillars.subtitle: B2B Corporate Services
pillars.description: Corporate relocations and university partnerships serving 300K+ BPO employees

financialHighlights.title: Financial Highlights
financialHighlights.description: Key financial metrics and projections. All growth rates calculated as CAGR. LTV = customer lifetime value, CAC = customer acquisition cost.

highlights.title: Unit Economics
highlights.description: Blended LTV:CAC improving from 3.1:1 to 19.5:1 (Formula: Weighted average of segment LTV:CAC ratios)

investmentThesis.title: Investment Thesis
investmentThesis.description: Why MyRoomie represents a compelling European growth opportunity

categories.title: Market Timing
points: European housing crisis creating unprecedented demand
Digital transformation accelerating in traditional sectors
BPO sector growth driving corporate relocation needs

categories.title: Execution Excellence
points: Proven model in Greece with successful pivot execution
Strong unit economics and improving efficiency metrics
Systematic market entry playbook for European expansion
Clear path to profitability with sustainable growth model
